typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		func_area as string,
		avg_volume as string,
		aging_avg_volume as string,
		rep_volume as string,
		stg_volume as string,
		years as (id as string, title as string, value as double, execution as double, color as string)[],
		current_min_2_vol_perc as double,
		current_min_1_vol_perc as double,
		current_year_vol_perc as double,
		old_year_vol_perc as double,
		data as (id as string, title as string, value as string, color as string)[],
		rep_perc as string,
		stg_perc as string,
		volume as double,
		func_size as double,
		volume_per_tb as double,
		func_size_per_tb as double,
		RSCS as (id as string, title as string, value as double, color as string)[],
		warm_potential as double,
		total as double,
		WarmPotential as (id as string, title as string, value as double, color as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	singleDocument: true,
	wildcardPaths:['Business.json']) ~> source1
source1 derive(id = id,
		func_area = func_area,
		year = years.value) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		{TableName;FileName} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
